price: 52. En Wij openbaarden aan Moesa, zeggende: “Neem Mijn slaven in de nacht weg, waarlijk jullie zullen vervolgd worden.”
arabic: ۞ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِيٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā an asri biʿibādī innakum muttabaʿūna
